reviewText: When I got this DVD it turn out to be much more than I expected.Gladys and the Pips were in rare form singing such songs as Every Beat Of My Heart,Friendship Train,On and ON,Grapevine,Midnight Train To Georgia.Gladys does a beautiful randition Evergreen and The Way We Were.And of course when Ray Charles came on stage.OH MY MY.Ray and Gladys did Neither One Of Us. This is a must for all R&B for the price.You could not beat it. Buy this one.You won't be sorry
Title: N/A

reviewText: I think people tend to forget that the days of Digital recording, 5.1 surround sound and HDTV are pretty recent. How can a 1980 performance look like a million dollar... We all know the limitations of older recordings and that's what you have to keep in mind before buying vintage concerts. Personally I am attracted by the emotion you can feel watching such amazing and unbelievable musicianship. There are only too few of these remarkable DVDs available today. Please keep'em coming, I am all for it, because high end technology can't make up for the awful music being released today. Keep the 5.1-Blue Ray-schmaltz and give us the real deal. (of course if you got the real deal in high quality I won't mind either! LOL)
summary: Please keep publishing those vintage concerts...
Title: N/A

reviewText: If you even LIKE these two entertainers, you'll LOVE this tape.  Gladys is so young and pretty and Ray's voice is at it's best.  A real fun tape.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Although this dvd shows Gladys and the Pips in the beginning of their career, I think you should look for a more up to date dvd.  By the time Ray started performing with them, it was time to go to sleep.  I'd pass this one by.
summary: Not the Best of Gladys and Ray
Title: N/A

reviewText: I was very dissapointed when I saw this DVD for the first time. Sound and video are terrible, believe me, terrible.The music is perfect, I love Gladys and Ray, but for me you need a good mix between performance and sound. This is not the case, very old concert and cheap production. Regards
